content: different colors if one color is chosen you will need a scant amount of a contrast color as the alternate color in the mosaic slip-stitch pattern **featured techniques** * tutorial videos for special techniques * i-cord edging * provisional cast-on for connecting cowl at end of project * using a lifeline as you go * cables without a cable needle * slip_stitch over * elongated stitch * mosaic slip_stitch 2-color * lace simple and then more complex * k2tog / k4tog **schedule of pattern releases** month #1 = decrease 22 2023 month #2 = jan 27 2024 month #3 = feb 24 2024 month #4 = mar 30 2024 month #5 = apr 27 2024 month #6 = may 25 2024 month #7 = jun 29 2024 month #8 = jul 27 2024 month #9 = aug 24 2024 month #10 = sep 28 2024 *do you have a finished project tag me on instagram and create a project page on ravelry instagram @knitwise_te and @bayareaknittingguild*
